name: Cisco Meraki
description: This app integrates with Cisco Meraki to provide management and monitoring capabilities for Meraki networks and devices

base_url.description: Base URL for the Meraki API (e.g., https://api.meraki.com)

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity
actions.verbose: This action connects to the Cisco Meraki API to verify the provided API key and connectivity.

actions.description: List the organizations that the user has privileges on
actions.verbose: This action retrieves a list of organizations accessible to the authenticated user.

actions.description: List all devices in an organization's inventory
actions.verbose: This action retrieves a list of all devices in the organization's inventory.

actions.description: Search for devices across all networks
actions.verbose: This action searches for devices using MAC address, serial number, model, or tags.

actions.description: List all devices in the network
actions.verbose: This action retrieves a list of all devices in the network.

per_page.description: The number of entries per page returned (3-1000)

actions.description: Update a device in the network
actions.verbose: This action updates an existing device in the network.

name.description: Name to assign to the device

tags.description: Tags to assign to the device (comma-separated allowed)

mac.description: MAC address to assign to the device

actions.description: Remove a device from the network
actions.verbose: This action removes an existing device from the network.

actions.description: List clients connected to a device
actions.verbose: This action retrieves a list of clients connected to a specific device.

actions.description: List Layer 3 firewall rules for a network
actions.verbose: This action retrieves the Layer 3 firewall rules configured for a specific network.

actions.description: Update Layer 3 firewall rules for a network
actions.verbose: This action updates the Layer 3 firewall rules for a specific network.

actions.description: List Layer 7 firewall rules for a network
actions.verbose: This action retrieves the Layer 7 firewall rules configured for a specific network.

actions.description: Update Layer 7 firewall rules for a network
actions.verbose: This action updates the Layer 7 firewall rules for a specific network.
This action retrieves a list of adaptive policies.
This action retrieves a list of adaptive policy acls.
This action retrieves a list of adaptive policy groups.
This action retrieves a list of adaptive policy settings.
